>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

@Icon[type:graviton] Graviton Revelation

As a standard action, you can cause a cloud of debris, microscopic particles, and small items to orbit you, trapped in your personal gravitational field. This grants you @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Kjba2E3Ad5oMJ7hV.JournalEntryPage.nyB6pt2dd6iVQGmS]{Concealment} against ranged attacks. This ability functions for 1 round or until you leave graviton mode.

When you are attuned or fully attuned, the cloud of debris and microscopic particles thickens, increasing the miss chance from your concealment to 50% on ranged attacks (though you are not considered to have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Kjba2E3Ad5oMJ7hV.JournalEntryPage.nyB6pt2dd6iVQGmS#total-concealment]{total concealment}).
